catalog.description: Research methodology patterns and their effectiveness

methods.description: Used to verify ownership structures, director appointments, and shareholding changes across multiple jurisdictions
Used to track ownership changes and regulatory approvals for MET Hungary
Used to identify directors and ownership structures of Cyprus-based entities

methods.source_name: MEKH (Hungarian Energy and Public Utility Regulatory Authority)
methods.description: Tracked regulatory approvals for ownership changes and transfers
European Commission merger control documents reviewed for ownership information
Legal documents from Slovakian courts used to confirm ownership structures
Competition authority documents reviewed for ownership confirmations
Swiss and Hungarian media articles analyzed for ownership claims and business activities
Hungarian news website Index used as source for buyout information
Source with knowledge of MET's legal matters provided insider information on shareholder-manager structure
Company website analyzed for historical ownership statements and corporate structure
Interview with MET subsidiary CEO analyzed for ownership details
Interview with Lakatos analyzed for ownership claims
Used to verify Keppel Infrastructure transaction details
German corporate registry searched to identify directors of About You GmbH and corporate affiliations of key individuals

methods.source_name: Aggregators of global corporate registry data
methods.description: Global corporate registry data aggregators used to identify corporate affiliations across multiple entities

methods.source_name: German media outlets including Der Spiegel, Hamburger Abendblatt, Süddeutsche Zeitung
methods.description: Local and national German media outlets monitored for coverage of individuals and companies, including interviews and news articles
Social media platforms monitored for public profiles, activity, and customer complaints

methods.source_name: About You website, Otto Group publications
methods.description: Company website and Otto Group publications reviewed for biographical and role information

methods.source_name: Multiple media sources and corporate records
methods.description: Public biographical information compiled from multiple sources including media interviews and corporate announcements
Search for MET Group's registered ownership structure and shareholder information
Interviews with former MOL employees about Lakatos-Hernádi relationship
Interviews with journalist who covered MET story extensively and interviewed both Lakatos and Hernádi
Interviews with former MET managers about company operations and ownership dynamics

methods.source_name: Senior executive at Zug-headquartered gas transmission company
methods.description: Interview with senior executive at gas transmission company personally friendly with Lakatos
Interview with corruption researcher analyzing MET operations
Interview with former classmate of Nagy at MGIMO about his background and potential KGB recruitment

methods.source_name: Former high-ranking officer at Hungary's counter intelligence
methods.description: Interview with former counter intelligence officer about potential Russian intelligence connections

methods.source_name: Former C-suite executive of Magyar Posta
methods.description: Interview with former Magyar Posta executive about Nagy's relationships
Analysis of Hungarian media reports on MET ownership structure and Lakatos buyout
Review of study by Corruption Research Centre Budapest on Lakatos' share acquisition

methods.source_name: Academic study analyzing MET's stakeholder map
methods.description: Analysis of network study examining MET stakeholder relationships and MET-MVM deal
Review of Forbes wealth rankings for Hungarian businessmen
Review of 2011 media reports on Magyar Posta contract award to Nagy

methods.source_name: Montenegrin company registry, Austrian commercial register
methods.description: Searched company registrations for Addiko Bank AD Podgorica and parent company Addiko Bank AG, including historical entities like Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank
Searched Austrian commercial register for parent company Addiko Bank AG and related entities
Searched UK Companies House for AEDC Capital Limited ownership structure
Searched Swiss registry for DDM Group entities in Zug canton
Searched Luxembourg registry for DDM Group Finance SA
Searched Massachusetts and Delaware registries for Brandes Investment Partners LP
Searched Singapore registry for MW Funds PTE Limited
Retrieved shareholder structure from Vienna Stock Exchange (ATX) listings for Addiko Bank AG
Searched Montenegrin media including state news agency MINA, Vijesti, Dan, Investitor for coverage of Addiko ME
Searched Austrian financial media including Der Börsianer for coverage of Addiko Group management changes
Searched Croatian media for historical coverage of Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank corruption allegations involving PM Ivo Sanader
Searched Montenegrin court database for litigation involving Addiko ME, but judgments are anonymized online
Searched for Croatian court records regarding Ivo Sanader corruption trial
Searched for Italian court records regarding Lorenzo Di Tommaso leasing contract fraud case
Interviewed former executive of one of Montenegro's top five commercial banks with 20+ years sector experience
Interviewed former senior officer of Montenegro's Ministry of Finance (banking sector analyst until 2018)
Interviewed representative of the Association of Montenegrin Banks with sector experience since 2005
Interviewed former Addiko ME employee (loan revision officer, 2016-2021)
Interviewed financial director of Addiko corporate client (retail company operating regionally since 2014)

methods.source_name: Addiko corporate client - real estate firm
methods.description: Interviewed manager of Addiko corporate client (real estate management firm, client since 2015)
Interviewed regional director of German private equity fund that invested in Addiko shares in 2019
Searched LinkedIn profiles for board members and executives of Addiko ME and parent company

methods.source_name: Addiko.me, Addiko Bank AG corporate website
methods.description: Reviewed company websites and annual reports for Addiko Group and subsidiaries
Reviewed Central Bank of Montenegro (CBCG) banking license records and regulatory filings
Reviewed Consumer Agency (CEZAP) complaints against Addiko ME regarding CHF loans

methods.source_name: ICSID (International Center for the Settlement of Investment Disputes)
methods.description: Reviewed ICSID case records for Addiko's arbitration against Montenegro government
Attempted to identify Dieter Forster associated with MW Funds PTE Limited but could not link any individuals found to Addiko

methods.source_name: Linde Verlag publication records, German-language book retailers
methods.description: Identified Austrian book published in 2015 by Linde Verlag about Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank corruption allegations
Reviewed investigative journalism by Hrvoje Appelt regarding Croatian corruption and Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank involvement
Searched Luxembourg company filings to obtain passport information
Identified ownership structure and subsidiaries of Tennor Holding B.V.
Confirmed ownership of London office property at 23 Savile Row
Tracked reports of USD 300 million investment in 50 West 66th Street building
Used ITU vessel communications database to identify yacht ownership
Searched FCC database for yacht licensing and ownership information
Tracked yacht location via coordinates to ICON Yachts shipyard
Obtained helicopter ownership data from BaFin regulatory filing

methods.source_name: helic.com and other aircraft data aggregators
methods.description: Identified helicopter ownership and recent locations via aircraft aggregators
Tracked helicopter sightings via Instagram aggregators
Tracked reports of Bombardier Global 6000 seizure and continued use
Confirmed ownership percentage in Hertha BSC football club
Affiliated LW with property at 21 Chesham Place via UK public records
